summary: Simple black recolor of the dragonscale armor
descriptionHtml:
Black colored version of Dragonscale armor that is based for stealth based combat
basically this is a black colored dragonscale armor set

Credits

Credit #1 thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim and Creation Kit
Credit #2 thanks to gimp 2 for easy recoloring and the creators of gimp for gimp 2
Credit #3 thanks to Arcane 51388 for helping me to create this recolor
Credit #4 thanks to Youtube for videos on Skyrim Re texturing and recoloring

read the readme just inside the textures folder or the readme option in the mod menu for install instructions now included both a 7zip and zip packaged versions which you shouldn\'t have any problems extracting them using any file extraction software such as 7zip but if you guys do have any problems leave a comment in the comments section and i\'ll try and help you as best i can thank you for those who downloads my mod and enjoys it
author: jab4201994
